ignobioR 1.0.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • ignobioR vignette

    ignobioR vignette

    my-vignette.Rmd
    library(ignobioR)

    Prepare the data

    
data(floratus) # Upload the dataset with occurrence data
head(floratus)
#>                                                       Taxon     Long     Lat
#> 101049 Trigonella elegans (Salzm. ex Ser.) Coulot & Rabaute 11.17838 43.1584
#> 101050                Cephalanthera longifolia (L.) Fritsch 11.17838 43.1584
#> 101051           Chaenorhinum minus (L.) Lange subsp. minus 11.17838 43.1584
#> 101052                                 Chondrilla juncea L. 11.17838 43.1584
#> 101053                                 Mercurialis annua L. 11.17838 43.1584
#> 101054                           Cirsium arvense (L.) Scop. 11.17838 43.1584
#>        uncertainty year
#> 101049    1784.124 1985
#> 101050    1784.124 1985
#> 101051    1784.124 1985
#> 101052    1784.124 1985
#> 101053    1784.124 1985
#> 101054    1784.124 1985

data(park) # Upload the study area
data(unsuitablezone) # Unsuitable areas, i.e. floristic records cannot occur

    Draft the virtual floristic list (VFL)

    
vfl <- virtual_list(data_flor=floratus, site=park, excl_areas=unsuitablezone, tau=20)
#> 
#> ##############################################################################################
#> Please be patient. The process can be very slow, dependeing on the amount of records provided
#> ##############################################################################################
#> 
#> Chosen Coordinate Reference System: +init=epsg:3035
#> Unsiuitable areas provided
#> Preparing spatial objects!
#> Drafting the Virtual Floristic List

vfl$statistics
#> NULL

    Draft the Map of Floristic Ignorance (MFI)

    mfi <- ignorance_map(data_flor=floratus, site=park, excl_areas=unsuitablezone, tau=20, cellsize=2000)
#> 
#> ##############################################################################################
#> Please be patient. The process can be very slow, dependeing on the amount of records provided
#> ##############################################################################################
#> 
#> Chosen Coordinate Reference System: +init=epsg:3035
#> Chosen tau: 20
#> Unsuitable areas provided. Plotting
#> Creating spatial objects
#> Plotting

    #> Filtering occurrence records having buffers intersecting the study area
#> Creating an empty raster

    #> Calculating species richness per cell
#> Preparing preliminary data to draft the Map of Floristic Ignorance
#> Drafting the Map of Floristic Ignorance!
#>
